page.title: 05AFTER SCHOOL ACTIVITIES
page.content: We enjoy our after school activities which includes{Choir(Tues),Drama(Wed) {Roller skating(Thur) and hockey(Fri). Mrs Walton takes us for choir. At the moment we are producing a musical called{David and Goliath,}written by Mr N.Walton.On Wednesdays Mrs.Walton takes us again for drama, which is linked with choir.Thursday is for roller skating. The infants roller skate in the front play ground under the supervision of parents, while the juniors skate in the large back play ground, under Mrs Cox's supervision. Friday is hockey day.Mr Murphy, the Headmaster takes us. Everybody enjoys after school activities, because they are good fun. If you are interested in an activity, you may develop that interest, and maybe join a larger club somewhere else when you are older.
